items.title: Beyond the "Magnificent Seven": My Top 2 Stocks to Become the Next Market Leaders
items.description: Taiwan Semiconductor and Visa could reach the size of the "Magnificent Seven" stocks.  Visa's consistent growth can boost its earnings significantly higher in 10 years.  Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing is a key beneficiary of the AI race.

items.title: Where Will Visa Be in 5 Years?
items.description: Thanks to the growth of cashless transactions, Visa will continue to put up solid revenue gains.  Being entrenched in how money flows between stakeholders, coupled with a powerful network effect, gives Visa tremendous staying power.  Chances are, that in your wallet, you have a credit or debit card that sports the Visa (NYSE: V) name and logo on it.

items.title: Why You Should Plan For A $2 Million Retirement ($10,000 Monthly Income)
Get Up to Speed on Stablecoins and Why They're the Hottest Thing in Crypto This Summer
items.author: Anders Bylund
items.description: Stablecoins are digital currencies tied to traditional assets like the U.S. dollar, with Circle's USDC leading the market. Major financial institutions are entering the stablecoin space, seeing potential profitability and mainstream adoption.

insights.sentiment_reasoning: Co-manages USDC, offers rewards for holding stablecoins, actively involved in cryptocurrency trading
Entering stablecoin market, exploring digital currency opportunities without clear market dominance yet
Exploring stablecoin partnerships and technologies without a definitive market strategy
Exploring stablecoin partnerships and technologies without a definitive market strategy
